decisions.description:
Decision to see if the record was created manually by user.
***Delete this and everything after this once you've updated for customer*** Depending on the customer's needs you'll find how and who will create leads within their system ideally they should be created via a List Import template or Web Form Submission. If users are manually creating leads find out what users and account for them within this decision logic. All of these currently will set every record to Created Rating = Lead 0 and set the user creating as the Record Owner & User Source ***End***
decisions.name: Created_manually_by_User_FIXME
decisions.label: Created manually by User? - FIXME

rules.name: Lead_3_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5)) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 3 - FIXME

rules.name: Lead_2_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5)) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 2 - FIXME

rules.name: Lead_1_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5)) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 1 - FIXME

rules.name: Lead_0_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5)) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 0 - FIXME
